description: Unit tests for the CustomApiTools class, testing various aspects such as initialization, header generation, request making, error handling, and support for multiple HTTP methods.

methods.name: api_tools
methods.description: Fixture creating a CustomApiTools instance with test configuration.

methods.name: mock_dog_image_response
methods.description: Fixture creating a mock response for dog image API.

methods.name: mock_dog_breeds_response
methods.description: Fixture creating a mock response for dog breeds API.

methods.name: test_get_auth_no_credentials
methods.description: Tests the _get_auth method with no credentials.

methods.name: test_get_headers
methods.description: Tests the _get_headers method with default headers and API key.

methods.name: test_get_headers_no_api_key
methods.description: Tests _get_headers when no API key is set.

methods.name: test_make_request_dog_image
methods.description: Tests a successful GET request to the dog image API.

methods.name: test_make_request_dog_breeds
methods.description: Tests a successful GET request to the dog breeds API.

methods.name: test_make_request_with_params
methods.description: Tests a request with query parameters.

methods.description: Tests making a request without a base URL.
